jobDescription: SEO Practitioners - A Fortune 500 fintech leader in Austin is looking for an SEO expert to own the global SEO strategy for key enterprise domains and ensure continual optimization of lead generation & organic search traffic. Sound interesting? Here are the role’s responsibilities:Collaborate closely with web development teams on tag implementationOwn global SEO strategy for multiple enterprise domainsPerform technical audit of existing sitesMeasure and report on KPI performanceTo be considered, please take a look at candidate requirements for eligibility:Strong working knowledge of front end development standardsExpert-level knowledge of SEO practicesExperience with Google analytics, webmaster & tag management toolsExperience managing multiple domains simultaneously
